entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:06 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 07:06 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
